{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:10.000
    | text      = Ladies and gentlemen, we have massive breaking news here dealing with the First Amendment in this country.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:17.000
    | text      = If you look at the situation in Connecticut with the Sandy Hook shootings that were used to collectively put guilt on the American people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:26.000
    | text      = and imply that gun owners collectively had murdered a bunch of little children in elementary school, you could see it was a psyop.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:33.000
    | text      = It's come out that Bloomberg put out emails the day before saying get ready with our Twitter, with our media to have a big push against guns the next 24 hours.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:42.000
    | text      = Very suspicious.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:43.000
    | text      = Then you've got the local regional SWAT team people hiding out in the woods in the same outfits as the supposed shooter.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:51.000
    | text      = You've got the whole story changing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
